    • Order

      public Order​(String dineTime, String dineDate, int tableNum, float totalAlaCarePrice, float totalPackagePrice, float totalPrice)
      Constructor Order so that we can append the orders and the prices to revenue database
      Parameters:
      dineTime - Time that customers dined
      dineDate - Date that customers dined (i.e reservation date)
      tableNum - table number
      totalAlaCartePrice - Total Price of all ala carte items ordered
      totalPackagePrice - Total Price of all packages ordered
      totalPrice - Total Price of all items and packages ordered
